Package insa.h4401.controller.states

Provides the classes necessary to navigate in the state machine of this application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IState
    This interface defines all the methods that should be implemented by logical states.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComputingRouteState
    This class represents the logic state in which the application is computing the best route to reach all delivery points.
    DefaultState
    This class represents the default logic state extended by all other concretes states.
    DeliverySelectedState
    This state represents the logic state when a delivery is selected on the map.
    EmptyNodeSelectedState
    This class represents the logic state when an emptyNode is selected on the map.
    InitState
    This class represents the logic state at the very beginning of the application.
    MapLoadedState
    This class represents the logic state when a map has been loaded.
    MapSelectState
    This class represents the logic state when the user is selecting a map to load.
    NothingSelectedState
    This class represents the logic state when a map and a planning are loaded but no node is selected.
    PlanningLoadedState
    This class represents the logic state when a planning has been loaded.
    PlanningSelectState
    This class represents the logic state when user is selecting a planning to load.
    SelectionsStates
    This abstract class provides common code for logic states when a map and a planning are loaded.
    SwapDeliveriesState
    This class represents the state when to deliveries are being swaped.
    WarehouseSelectedState
    This class represents the logic state when warehouse is selected on the map.

Package insa.h4401.controller.states Description

Provides the classes necessary to navigate in the state machine of this application.

States are managed by ContextManager in the package Controller
